articles.author: Aubrie Spady
articles.title: Trump still needs Congress' help with plan to abolish Education Department - Fox News
articles.description: President Donald Trump is expected to sign an executive order to abolish the Department of Education, but he would need congressional approval to do completely eliminate the agency.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump could begin to dismantle the Department of Education via an executive order, but he would need congressional approval in order to officially abolish the agency.
Trump is expec… [+4414 chars]

articles.author: Gillian Tan, Randall Williams
articles.title: Bill Chisholm Group Is Front-Runner to Buy Boston Celtics - Bloomberg
articles.description: A consortium that includes STG Partners co-founder Bill Chisholm reached a deal to buy the National Basketball Association’s Boston Celtics for $6.1 billion.
articles.content:
A consortium that includes STG Partners co-founder Bill Chisholm reached a deal to buy the National Basketball Associations Boston Celtics for $6.1 billion.
The takeover is the biggest NBA deal ever… [+105 chars]
